snippet.title: Telefrag VR – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Telefrag VR to your Steam Wishlist and try open beta now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/916100/Telefrag_VR/

Fight on the abstract arenas in the fast-paced PvP arena shooter. Pick different weapons loadouts featuring Plasma Rifle or Rocket Launcher, master them and telefrag your enemies. Dominate on the battlefield towering the leaderboards to become the invincible one.

Future. Modern technology made the Roman Empire expand its sphere beyond the Earth. Despite the technological advancement they didn't, forget the pillars and traditions that have accompanied the empire since the dawn of time. One of them is gladiatorial battles, which has grown to the rank of the most prestigious sport in the whole Empire.

Music by: Mikołaj Stroiński, Paweł Górniak
SFX by: Daniel Birczyński

---

Follow Telefrag on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/telefragvr
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TelefragVR
